name: lagswitch!
description:
your mission:

you are tasked to control a rover on a distant planet. if only the input latency wasn't so high...
hammer that lagswitch! and quickly type in your commands to manuever the rover until it reaches its destination!

how to play:

press space to activate the lagswitch, then quickly type your command and hit enter!
IMPORTANT: you need to press space twice after the first time in the web version due to some input field funkiness.
(if you clicked outside the game you have to click inside it once at the beginning)

download:

for the best experience and fullscreen support, download the game below :)
linux:        download and unpack zip, click on lagswitch.x86_64
windows: download and unpack zip, click on lagswitch!.exe
quit: linux, windows: alt+f4
